sentences.sContent: He said he had just picked up the druken man from the footpath and did not know him from Adam.
sentences.sCn: 他说他只是把这个倒在人行道上的醉汉扶了起来，他根本不认识他。

sentences.sContent: The sun was shining gloriously, so Karen and the old lady went along the footpath through the corn, where it was rather dusty.
sentences.sCn: 那天艳阳高照，凯伦和老妇人沿着穿过玉米地的小路去教堂，一路上灰尘漫天。

trans.tranOther: a narrow path for people to walk along, especially in the country
